name: Singapore
summary: Indian passport holders must obtain a Singapore visa before traveling, unless they have a valid long-term visa/residence permit from the US, UK, Canada, Australia, Germany, or Switzerland.

documents.name: Passport
documents.details: Valid for at least 6 months, 2 blank pages

documents.name: Cover Letter
documents.details: Explaining purpose and duration of visit

documents.name: Employment Proof
documents.details: NOC, Company ID, or business registration

conditions: Valid visa for US, UK, Canada, Australia, Germany, Switzerland, or New Zealand

important_notes.content: Overstaying leads to fines or blacklisting
Always carry printout of e-Visa and supporting documents

name: Japan
summary: Indian citizens require a visa to enter Japan. Applications must be submitted through VFS Global, not directly to the embassy.

conditions: Valid visa for US, Canada, UK, Australia, or Schengen

important_notes.content: Overstaying is strictly penalized in Japan
Book refundable flights/hotels until visa is issued
Must apply through VFS Global, not directly to embassy

name: Thailand
summary: Indian citizens need a visa to enter Thailand, unless they qualify for a Visa on Arrival under certain conditions.

documents.name: Passport
documents.details: Valid for at least 6 months, 2 blank pages

important_notes.content: Overstay fine: â‚¹1,800 per day (500 THB/day)
Carry exact Thai Baht for VOA
VOA only available at designated airports

name: United Arab Emirates
summary: Indian citizens can obtain UAE visa on arrival or apply for e-visa. Dubai and other emirates offer various visa options for tourism and business.

visa_types.name: Tourist Visa on Arrival
conditions: Minimum salary â‚¹2 lakh per month

application_methods.name: Visa on Arrival
application_methods.description: Available for eligible Indian passport holders

application_methods.name: Online e-Visa
application_methods.description: Apply through official UAE visa portal

important_notes.content: Check VOA eligibility based on profession and salary
Overstay penalties are strictly enforced
Hotel booking mandatory for tourist visa

name: Malaysia
summary: Indian citizens require a visa to enter Malaysia. eVisa and visa on arrival options are available depending on the purpose of visit.

important_notes.content: eVisa is recommended over visa on arrival
Yellow fever vaccination required if coming from infected areas

name: South Korea
summary: Indian citizens need a visa to enter South Korea. Various visa types are available including tourist, business, and transit visas.

embassies.address: Consulate General of Republic of Korea
Consulate General of Republic of Korea

important_notes.content: Apply well in advance during peak season
Invitation letter may be required for some cases

name: Maldives
summary: Indian citizens can visit Maldives without a visa for tourism purposes. Free visa on arrival for up to 90 days.

specifications: No photo required for visa-free entry

important_notes.content: Keep hotel booking confirmation handy
Must have sufficient funds for stay

name: Mauritius
summary: Indian citizens can visit Mauritius without a visa for tourism and business purposes for up to 90 days.

important_notes.content: Yellow fever vaccination required if coming from infected areas
Return ticket mandatory

name: China
summary: All Indian passport holders require a visa to enter China. The type of visa depends on the purpose of visit.

documents.name: Additional documents as per visa type (e.g., invitation letter)

application_methods.name: embassy
application_methods.description: Apply through embassy or visa center

BIPI Building Omega, Ground Floor, Bengal Intelligent Park, Block EP & GP, Sector V, Bidhan Nagar, Kolkata - 700091

Apply at least 3 months prior to travel for safe processing.

name: Philippines
summary: Indian passport holders require a visa to enter the Philippines unless they meet conditions for visa-free entry under certain international visas.

application_methods.name: embassy
application_methods.description: Apply through embassy or visa center

important_notes.content: Always check the latest travel advisory before booking
Do not overstay your visaâ€”fines and blacklisting apply
Travel insurance is recommended, though not mandatory
If eligible for 14-day visa-free entry, do not overstayâ€”it cannot be converted or extended inside the Philippines
Tourist visas can usually be extended at the Bureau of Immigration in the Philippines
Processing time may vary based on consulate and application volume

name: Cambodia
summary: Indian passport holders require a visa to enter Cambodia. Options include eVisa, Visa on Arrival, or Embassy Visa.

application_methods.name: embassy
application_methods.description: Apply through embassy or visa center

name: Vietnam
summary: Indian nationals require a visa to enter Vietnam, unless they hold a valid visa exemption or enter under specific e-visa rules.

visa_types.name: Embassy Visa (Sticker Visa)
visa_types.purpose: Longer stays, work permits, multi-entry business
